title: Statistics and Data Science Workshop Series
text:
Statistics and Data Science Workshop Series


University of California, Santa Barbara





Welcome to the official website of the Statistics and Data Science Workshop, hosted at the University of California, Santa Barbara! Here, you can find out more about the series, as well as view the final projects of our current groups. Please note that this is a living website- check back frequently for updates!



         


Upcoming Events

title: Meet the Officers
text:
Founder













Kris Hao


Kris is a Junior (pronouns she/hers) pursuing a Bachelors of Science in Data Science. She has coding experience in Python, RStudio, SQL, SAS Studio, and Git. Her main goal through co-founding the Statistics and Data Science Workshop Series is to bring together a group of talented and data-passionate students, no matter their technical-level, knowledge, or data-exposure, to work together and maximize their technical potential by learning and applying fundamental project concepts taught through the series.
















Founder













Anya Macomber


Anya (pronouns she/her) is a 3rd year SDS major and student in UCSB’s PaCE EMT program. After her graduation in Spring 2023, she plans to work as an EMT. In her free time Anya enjoys reading, making art, and spending time with her cat, Sheldon.
















Social Media Coordinator













Mollie


Mollie (pronouns she/her) is a second year Stats and Data Science major. She is really excited to be a part of the workshop and meet more people while learning more about her major. She can usually be found with her head buried in a book or in yarn trying to crochet.
















Graduate Student Advisor













Ethan Marzban


Ethan is currently in the 3rd year of his PhD program in the PSTAT Department, having joined the department in 2020 after earning his Bachelor’s degree (also in Statistics). Outside of Statistics, he enjoys playing the piano, drinking boba, and talking about cats (and may or may not secretly be a cat himself).















Faculty Advisor













Dr. Uma Ravat


Dr. Uma Ravat.

title: About
text:
Founded in 2023 by Kris Hao and Anya Macomber, the workshop series aims to provide an inclusive and collegial atmosphere where motivated students can engage more fully with real-world datasets and projects. Our goals as an organization are:

To first create some more concrete goals!!
